meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Grace Riley James Behrens Julia Collins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6824.

td.p: Grace Riley, a writer from Fort Smith, Arkansas
James Behrens, a geophysicist from San Diego, California
Julia Collins, a supply chain professional from Kenilworth, Illinois (whose 3-day cash winnings total $53,105)

tr.td: FILL IN THE MOVIE TITLES
FROM "B" TO "Y"
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with the letter "B" and end with a "Y".)
THE WOMAN WHO WROTE...
IT WAS AN ACCIDENT
THAT EXPLANATION
DOES HOLD WATER

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Both have scenes about selling burgers:
"____ Food Nation" & "____ Times at Ridgemont High"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
